## Description {#details}

This pass transforms loops that contain a conditional branch with induction variable.

For example, it transforms left code to right code: <CodeBlock>                         newbound = min(n, c)
</CodeBlock> while (iv &lt; n) &#123; while(iv &lt; newbound) &#123; A A if (iv &lt; c) B B C C &#125; if (iv != n) &#123; while (iv &lt; n) &#123; A C &#125; &#125;

Definition at line 34 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/loopboundsplit-h">LoopBoundSplit.h</a>.
